description:
The Hinata family runs into a mysterious new hot springs resort... run by the Keroro Platoon!  And then it`s the return of the Hicksville Beach Swimsuit Beauty Comedy Team Contest!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le voyage d`April et d`Artus / Le concours estival de duo comique
Natsumi to Fuyuki no Kamigakushi de Arimasu / Keroro Kourei! Manatsu no Owarai Battle de Arimasu
Return to the Wet Hot Beaches!
夏美と冬樹 の神隠し であります / ケロロ 恒例! 真夏のお笑いバトル であります
